column1: #Text=—The director# have issued summonses in respect of the call of £lO against all those shareholders who have not paid.
#Text=The number of individuals thus brought within the grasp of the law is about £2,000, and the £lO call represents altogether £1,000,000, The Cattle Plaque.
#Text=—Only six cases of cattl# plague are reported in Great Britain for the week ending October 20, being a decrease of five on the previous week.
#Text=Summonses were issued on Thursday for a cabinet council, to be held at the official residenc# of the First Lord of the Treasury. in Downingstreet, on Wednesday next, the 31st instant.
